Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2010 03:00AM SKRinVA wrote: A lot of organizations like Susan G. Komen offer a lot of resources, and I got this link off their website:  http://www.patientadvocate.org This organization helps people fight their insurance companies for coverage.  Medicare is not actually insurance, but maybe this group can help your friend.  It does seem as though the reconstruction should have to be covered if the surgery was done because of cancer.
